      • procSimple

        public static org.opencv.core.Mat procSimple(org.opencv.core.Mat img,
                                             short size)
        "Flating" and normalizing matrix
        Parameters:
        img - input matrix
        size - size of output
        Returns:
        "falated" input matrix. It has one row and size * size cols.
        Output matrix is type of CV_32FC1

        size - size of output
        Returns:

        Parameters:
